name: Caribbean Military Academy School of Aviation (formerly Caribbean Military Aviation School)
about: The Caribbean Military Academy School of Aviation, established as part of the Caribbean Military Academy, is a premier institution for aviation training in the region. It offers comprehensive programs including Pre-Abinitio and Primary Flight Training, focusing on controlling the aircraft and visual flying. The school utilizes state-of-the-art simulation and aviation training equipment to equip students with the necessary skills for effective military aviation operations and maintenance. Students are trained by highly experienced instructors in both rotary and fixed-wing aviation, as well as in specialized areas such as airframe, engine, and avionics. The school aims to be a world-class institution, providing tertiary-level education and certification, and is committed to building a skilled and professional aviation force for the Jamaica Defence Force and the region. Our goal is to produce graduates who meet the highest standards of the aviation industry.
services:
["Military Wings (Fixed) Flying Course
Military Wings (Rotary) Flying Course
Performance Oriented Electronics Training (POET)
Aircraft Maintenance Training (AMT) Basic Avionics Course
Basic Airframe and Engines Course (A & E)
Aircraft Maintenance Management Training (AMMT) (Upgraders Course)
Aircraft Structural Repairers Course"]
